item.title: Capybara and asynchronous stuff
item.description: What is Capybara, Poltergeist and PhantomJS? In this part I will try to cover the following aspects: Running asynchronous code in a web driver Making the call synchronous Wrapping it into some common solution Advanced example - working with IndexedDB from Capybara PhantomJS First of all, we need to know what is PhantomJS. I would say it’s a ’tool that acts like a browser but can be controlled from outside using simple command interface’.
